body_html: Also, does DataSet.shuffle(buffer_size) require that buffer_size elements will fit into memory? (the actual outputs of the iterator) because if it does, it makes it not very useful in a tfrecords scenario of a big file.
body_text: Also, does DataSet.shuffle(buffer_size) require that buffer_size elements will fit into memory? (the actual outputs of the iterator) because if it does, it makes it not very useful in a tfrecords scenario of a big file.
body: Also, does DataSet.shuffle(buffer_size) require that buffer_size elements will fit into memory? (the actual outputs of the iterator) because if it does, it makes it not very useful in a tfrecords scenario of a big file.
